import React from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Table, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const GetCategory = () => { const [data, setData] = React.useState([]) const [editIndex, setEditIndex] = React.useState(null) const dispatch = useDispatch(); React.useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:2000/admin/getcategory`) .then(res => (setData(res.data))) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, [data]) const renderTable = () => { return data.map((item, index) => { return ( index === editIndex ? {index + 1} : {index + 1} {item.category} ) }) } return (
{renderTable()}
No Category Action
) } export default GetCategory
